QuestData.Title: It's Just a Coin, What Could it Cost?
QuestData.Description:
<This curious object provides more questions than answers. How did you come to have it? What is it used for? Is it dangerous?>
<If the Eternal City does not hold answers for you, then surely the Brokers who trade there will.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out a Broker in Oribos for information.
QuestData.RewardText: That coin... no one in Oribos will take its kind, and I doubt you'd survive the trip to the market that could. If I may be so bold, perhaps my associates and I could provide assistance?
